What to Expect

12twenty_live is where innovators in education come together to learn, share and connect. Join us for 3 days of inspiration, education, hands-on training, and product demonstrations!

Learn

About new innovations, data utilization and 12twenty product features

Share

Ideas and experiences that benefit your peers and employers

Connect

With your friends and other industry professionals over coffee and cocktails

The Venue

Location

Located in the heart of the UCLA campus, the Luskin Center is convenient to the best sites and attractions Los Angeles has to offer, including Downtown, Hollywood, and L.A.’s Westside.

$249+ per night

Room rate is based on availability for December 11th - 13th, 2019 Group Block Closes: Saturday, October 11th, 2019

Book Your Room

Things To Do

Santa Monica Guide

Its proximity to the greater Los Angeles area makes Santa Monica the perfect base for vacationers and business travelers.

Rodeo Drive Directory

In the heart of Beverly Hills, three blocks of Rodeo Drive are home to the epicenter of luxury, fashion and lifestyle.

Hollywood Attractions

A cultural epicenter, with museums, landmarks and other attractions that celebrate L.A.’s rich film history.
